rows.label: qst201905_msg0001
rows.name:
Mmm... We see that it is indeed
a place of spacious proportions.

rows.label: qst201905_msg0002
rows.name:
Where might we find the black-
feathered fool, Tora?

rows.label: qst201905_msg0003
rows.name:
How should Tora know?! Me not know
what other Nopon doing just cause me
also Nopon!

rows.label: qst201905_msg0004
rows.name:
A shame. Then we have no choice but
to inquire based on our memory of the
incident.

rows.label: qst201905_msg0005
rows.name: We do have a name, though: Suisui.

rows.label: qst201905_msg0007
rows.name: That still not much to go on...

rows.label: qst201905_msg0008
rows.name:
We shan't know unless we try.
Come. Let us perambulate and
look for suspicious individuals.

rows.label: qst201905_msg0009
rows.name:
Good idea to start from first floor
first!
